node.title: docker启动时，环境变量“SEATA_IP”配置成域名无效
node.bodyHTML:
docker启动时，环境变量“SEATA_IP”配置成域名无效

我用的是官方docker镜像
官方文档对此环境变量的描述是：指定seata-server启动的IP，该IP用于向注册中心注册时使用，如eureka等。
我配置成如“a.b.c”的域名，发现无效，nacos的服务详情里还是IP。
该环境变量是不是只能是IP，无法配置成如“a.b.c”的域名？

node.title: TCC模式超时异常问题
node.bodyHTML:
Ⅰ. Issue Description

TCC模式下，global commit的响应依赖于branch commit的响应。而global commit与branch commit的处理线程用的同一线程池，当并发量较大时，若线程池里都是global commit的线程，此时无法创建新线程执行branch commit的响应处理，导致超时。

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

io.seata.core.exception.BranchTransactionException: Send branch commit failed, xid = 172.22.192.1:8091:95932365511069696 branchId = 95932366370902016
	at io.seata.server.coordinator.AbstractCore.branchCommit(AbstractCore.java:161)
	at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCore.doGlobalCommit(DefaultCore.java:200)
	at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCore.commit(DefaultCore.java:166)
	at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCoordinator.doGlobalCommit(DefaultCoordinator.java:172)
	at io.seata.server.AbstractTCInboundHandler$2.execute(AbstractTCInboundHandler.java:99)
	at io.seata.server.AbstractTCInboundHandler$2.execute(AbstractTCInboundHandler.java:94)
	at io.seata.core.exception.AbstractExceptionHandler.exceptionHandleTemplate(AbstractExceptionHandler.java:117)
	at io.seata.server.AbstractTCInboundHandler.handle(AbstractTCInboundHandler.java:94)
	at io.seata.core.protocol.transaction.GlobalCommitRequest.handle(GlobalCommitRequest.java:34)
	at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCoordinator.onRequest(DefaultCoordinator.java:441)
	at io.seata.core.rpc.processor.server.ServerOnRequestProcessor.onRequestMessage(ServerOnRequestProcessor.java:128)
	at io.seata.core.rpc.processor.server.ServerOnRequestProcessor.process(ServerOnRequestProcessor.java:75)
	at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.AbstractNettyRemoting.lambda$processMessage$2(AbstractNettyRemoting.java:281)
	at io.seata.server.Server$1.lambda$execute$0(Server.java:64)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
	at io.netty.util.concurrent.FastThreadLocalRunnable.run(FastThreadLocalRunnable.java:30)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Caused by: java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException: cost 30013 ms
	at io.seata.core.protocol.MessageFuture.get(MessageFuture.java:62)
	at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.AbstractNettyRemoting.sendSync(AbstractNettyRemoting.java:191)
	at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.AbstractNettyRemotingServer.sendSyncRequest(AbstractNettyRemotingServer.java:85)
	at io.seata.server.coordinator.AbstractCore.branchCommitSend(AbstractCore.java:168)
	at io.seata.server.coordinator.AbstractCore.branchCommit(AbstractCore.java:158)
	... 17 more

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

  1. io.seata.server.Server里线程池WORKING_THREADS的MIN_SERVER_POOL_SIZE设为1，单个请求下可复现问题。
  2. 并发量大时可复现问题。

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

设置seata.transport.enableClientBatchSendRequest为false
且把io.seata.core.rpc.netty.NettyRemotingServer.registerProcessor()里MessageType.TYPE_GLOBAL_COMMIT与MessageType.TYPE_GLOBAL_ROLLBACK等注册进去的线程池使用new出来一个新线程池(默认用的同一个)可解决问题。

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version : 1.8
  • OS : centOS
  • seata version:1.4.1

node.title: 请问，TCC模式下，rm端线程池默认值是不是太小了？压测时，tcc同步调用rm端commit方法时，会超时
node.bodyHTML:
TCC模式，seata server在同步调用rm的commit方法时，会出现

2021-05-08 14:22:25.102 ERROR --- [ ServerHandlerThread_1_10_1000] i.s.c.e.AbstractExceptionHandler         : Catch TransactionException while do RPC, request: xid=10.11.117.6:4426:8845200782043429105,extraData=null
==>

        at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCore.lambda$doGlobalCommit$1(DefaultCore.java:240) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.session.SessionHelper.forEach(SessionHelper.java:182) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCore.doGlobalCommit(DefaultCore.java:192) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCore.commit(DefaultCore.java:168) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCoordinator.doGlobalCommit(DefaultCoordinator.java:170) [seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.AbstractTCInboundHandler$2.execute(AbstractTCInboundHandler.java:95) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.AbstractTCInboundHandler$2.execute(AbstractTCInboundHandler.java:90) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.core.exception.AbstractExceptionHandler.exceptionHandleTemplate(AbstractExceptionHandler.java:124) ~[seata-core-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.AbstractTCInboundHandler.handle(AbstractTCInboundHandler.java:90) [seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.core.protocol.transaction.GlobalCommitRequest.handle(GlobalCommitRequest.java:34) [seata-core-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCoordinator.onRequest(DefaultCoordinator.java:473) [seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.core.rpc.processor.server.ServerOnRequestProcessor.onRequestMessage(ServerOnRequestProcessor.java:116) [seata-core-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.core.rpc.processor.server.ServerOnRequestProcessor.process(ServerOnRequestProcessor.java:77) [seata-core-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.AbstractNettyRemoting.lambda$processMessage$2(AbstractNettyRemoting.java:279) [seata-core-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1149) ~[na:1.8.0_181]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:624) ~[na:1.8.0_181]
        at io.netty.util.concurrent.FastThreadLocalRunnable.run(FastThreadLocalRunnable.java:30) ~[netty-all-4.1.30.Final.jar:4.1.30.Final]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748) ~[na:1.8.0_181]
Caused by: io.seata.core.exception.BranchTransactionException: Send branch commit failed, xid = 10.11.117.6:4426:8845200782043429105 branchId = 7494120885082147938
        at io.seata.server.coordinator.AbstractCore.branchCommit(AbstractCore.java:167) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCore.lambda$doGlobalCommit$1(DefaultCore.java:204) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        ... 17 common frames omitted
Caused by: java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException: cost 30000 ms
        at io.seata.core.protocol.MessageFuture.get(MessageFuture.java:62) ~[seata-core-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.AbstractNettyRemoting.sendSync(AbstractNettyRemoting.java:197) [seata-core-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.AbstractNettyRemotingServer.sendSyncRequest(AbstractNettyRemotingServer.java:71) ~[seata-core-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.coordinator.AbstractCore.branchCommitSend(AbstractCore.java:174) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        at io.seata.server.coordinator.AbstractCore.branchCommit(AbstractCore.java:164) ~[seata-server-1.4.2.jar:na]
        ... 18 common frames omitted

我个人认为，RmNettyRemotingClient中，内部的messageExecutor的线程数太小了。
我在配置中心里加了这个参数transport.threadFactory.workerThreadSize能改善这个问题。

但是，io.seata.core.rpc.netty.NettyBaseConfig#WORKER_THREAD_SIZE 这个变量会用于server的serverSelectorThreads和serverWorkerThreads。

是不是在tcc模式中，单独给rm的线程池一个参数，会好些？

如果有说错的地方，请指教，谢谢！~

node.title: 不停的fullGc，导致服务无响应
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

dubbo服务的分布式事务，在执行了100多W事务后，每秒大概600左右事务，seata-server开始不停GC，直致无响应

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

If there is an exception, please attach the exception trace:
GC日志：

9877.539: [Full GC (Ergonomics) 1923069K->1923069K(2010112K), 1.7196613 secs]
9879.259: [Full GC (Ergonomics) 1923071K->1923071K(2010112K), 1.7209864 secs]
9880.980: [Full GC (Ergonomics) 1923071K->1923071K(2010112K), 1.7254770 secs]
9882.706: [Full GC (Ergonomics) 1923071K->1923071K(2010112K), 1.7320489 secs]
9884.439: [Full GC (Ergonomics) 1923071K->1923071K(2010112K), 1.7189184 secs]

node.title: AOP动态创建/关闭Seata分布式事务中怎么获取GlobalTransactionRole
node.bodyHTML:
seata版本1.4.0
开发环境为 idea
注册中心eureka
AOP实现的demo：(http://seata.io/zh-cn/blog/seata-spring-boot-aop-aspectj.html)

RT：
AOP中通过@before来发起或者参与事务，参考源码GlobalTransactionContext中的
public static GlobalTransaction getCurrentOrCreate() {
GlobalTransaction tx = getCurrent();
if (tx == null) {
return createNew();
}
return tx;
}

当@AfterReturning时API方式中没有获取当前 GlobalTransactionRole的方法？？？

node.title: 事务Session过多时，TC启动被阻塞一段时间
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe in details
当Store为redis时，由于事务提交速度过快，导致redis中遗留大量的事务session未来的及清除，当TC重启时SessionHolder.init()会同步加载所有session，循环检查，此时会阻塞TC启动进程，目前遇到过的最长阻塞超过10分钟。

How it could be?

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. You can explain more about input of the feature, and output of it.
可否考虑异步处理，不阻塞主进程

Other related information

Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

pullRequest.title: feature: TCC mode support idempotent and anti hanging

nodes.message: optimize: `JacksonUndoLogParser` supports to parsing `LocalDateTime` (#3738)

node.title: Some improvments abount TCC are in planning or in progress?
node.bodyHTML:
1. In AT mode, seata prevents resources from suspending, as well as unnecessary rollback. e.g:
    first. TC- Rollback -> RM
    second. TM - do sth -> RM
    I found it not be taken to account in TCC mode. Is it better to implement it in business code ? Or should seata handle it?

  2. In additional, I'd like to code the commit/rollback methods without parameter BusinessActionContext, other parameters should be "auto-wired":

boolean rollback(@XxxParameter("opId") long opId){
    ...
}

node.title: seata is not compatible with mysql-connector 8.0.22 when using shardingjdbc
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

seata 1.3+shardingjdbc4.1.1+mysql-connector

  @DubboReference
    private SeckillService seckillService;
    @DubboReference
    private GoodsService goodsService;

    /**
     * 测试seata分布式事务
     */
    @GetMapping("/test")
    @GlobalTransactional
    public void testGlobalTransaction() {
        Goods goods = new Goods();
        goods.setName("test");
        goodsService.addGoods(goods, null);
        Seckill seckill = seckillService.getById(1001L);
        seckill.setNumber(seckill.getNumber() - 1);
        seckillService.saveOrUpdate(seckill);
        // 测试异常情况
        throw new RuntimeException();
    }

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

If there is an exception, please attach the exception trace:

when I use mysql-connector-java 8.0.21 driver it works fine,but when I swtich to 8.0.22 the console prints the error message like this:

node.title: TCC模式下，TC db在二阶段宕机，一段时间后恢复，未提交的全局事务无法重试
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

TCC模式下，TM向TC发送GlobalCommitRequest，TC开始提交各分支事务。
在提交过程中，TC端的db服务器宕机，数据库连接抛出异常，异常在doGlobalCommit内被捕获后执行 globalSession.queueToRetryCommit()。
因数据库连接异常，无法将全局事务的状态更改为 CommitRetrying。因此，即使数据库在一段时间后恢复，该未提交的全局事务也无法被重试，并且以Committing的状态留在数据库中，导致最终不一致。

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

If there is an exception, please attach the exception trace:

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

数据库恢复后，未提交的全局事务可以被重试。

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

@GlobalTransactional
public void business() {
    FeignClientA.try();
    FeignClientB.try();
}
  1. 在二阶段TC提交分支事务A的过程中，关闭TC端的数据库服务
  2. 等到TM输出 commit status: Committing 日志后，重启TC端的数据库服务
  3. 此后会发现该未提交的全局事务无法被重试

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

node.title: 配置seata.enabled=false后项目启动报错
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

使用io.seata:seata-spring-boot-starter:1.4.2
以下是我的配置:

seata.enabled=false
seata.enable-auto-data-source-proxy=true
seata.data-source-proxy-mode=AT
seata.tx-service-group=default
seata.service.vgroup-mapping.default=default
seata.service.grouplist.default=localhost:8091
seata.client.undo.log-serialization=kryo

启动项目后报错:

***************************
APPLICATION FAILED TO START
***************************

Description:

Parameter 0 of method seataAutoDataSourceProxyCreator in io.seata.spring.boot.autoconfigure.SeataDataSourceAutoConfiguration required a bean of type 'io.seata.spring.boot.autoconfigure.properties.SeataProperties' that could not be found.


Action:

Consider defining a bean of type 'io.seata.spring.boot.autoconfigure.properties.SeataProperties' in your configuration.

II. Describe what you expected to happen

查看源码io.seata.spring.boot.autoconfigure.SeataDataSourceAutoConfiguration.class

发现@ConditionalOnExpression("${seata.enable:true} && ${seata.enableAutoDataSourceProxy:true} && ${seata.enable-auto-data-source-proxy:true}")

与io.seata.spring.boot.autoconfigure.properties.SeataProperties.class中的enabled属性不符

是否应将seata.enable:true替换为```seata.enabled:true``?

III. Environment:

  • JDK version : 1.8.0_271
  • OS : MacOS BigSur_11.1

pullRequest.title: bugfix:fix postgresql JDBC connecting multiple schemas leads to undo_log table cannot be cleared (#3591)

node.title: postgresql   JDBC连接多Schema导致undo_log表无法清空
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

使用如下JDBC URL连接 postgresql 数据库
jdbc:postgresql://ip:port/db?currentSchema=schema1,commonschema
jdbc:postgresql://ip:port/db?currentSchema=schema2,commonschema

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

导致ChannelManager#dbKeytoSet 方法在拆分字符串时出现错误(Constants.DBKEYS_SPLIT_CHAR = ",")。
使得与RM无法通讯，undo_log表无法清空
源码如下：

private static Set<String> dbKeytoSet(String dbkey) {
        if (StringUtils.isNullOrEmpty(dbkey)) {
            return null;
        }
        return new HashSet<String>(Arrays.asList(dbkey.split(Constants.DBKEYS_SPLIT_CHAR)));
    }

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

应使用其它分隔符，目前我自己修改源码，使用“,,”作为分隔符（String DBKEYS_SPLIT_CHAR = ",,";）

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version : Java 8
  • OS : CentOs 7
  • Others: postgresql 数据库

node.title: zookeeper作为配置中心，修改client.rm.lock.retryInterval 无法生效的问题
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. 问题描述

当修改了配置中心client.rm.lock.retryInterval 的属性值。LockRetryController.GlobalConfig.onChangeEvent可以监听到改值得变化。
但是GlobalConfig 却没有将值写入到相关Configuration类得成员变量。导致zk设定的配置属性不生效。

Ⅱ. 重现细节

问题点：

onChangeEvent 中下面这段逻辑判断无法进去； 因而无法正常给相关成员变量赋值。
if (ConfigurationKeys.CLIENT_LOCK_RETRY_INTERVAL.equals(dataId)) {
globalLockRetryInternal = NumberUtils.toInt(newValue, defaultRetryInternal);
}

分析原因：

ConfigurationKeys.CLIENT_LOCK_RETRY_INTERVAL = client.rm.lock.retryInterval
dataId = /seata/client.rm.lock.retryInterval
ConfigurationKeys.CLIENT_LOCK_RETRY_INTERVAL != dataId ；

修改建议：

dataId 应该删除掉/seata部分，也就是删除掉ROOT_PATH.

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version :1.8
  • seata 1.4.0
  • zookeeper 3.4.14
  • mysql8

pullRequest.title: bugfix: fix oracle xa mode cannot be used

node.title: Seata-XA not working on Oracle
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

Seata-xa mode can't work on Oracle
oracle version: Database 11g Enterprise Edition Release 11.2.0.4.0 - 64bit Production
project: https://github.com/seata/seata-samples/tree/master/seata-xa

Attention

It's one Oracle Instance not multi oracle instance.
All Table in the same oracle schema.

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

When access http://localhost:8084/purchase , the page output is: Purchase Failed:订单服务调用失败,事务回滚!

node.title: 注释错误
node.bodyHTML:
package io.seata.core.rpc.netty.RmNettyRemotingClient

private void registerProcessor() {
// 1.registry rm client handle branch commit processor
// 2.registry rm client handle branch commit processor
}

这个 2. 应该是 registry rm client handle branch rollback processor

node.title: Support the use of spring schema to configure seata

Why you need it?

There are still some projects using xml for configuration, so we need to support schema configuration.

How it could be?

It supports the configuration of seata in the way of schema.

Other related information

pullRequest.title: feature: support manual way to rollback without exception

node.title: 关于Feign降级导致seata服务不能回滚问题
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

#2088
参考了上面这个问题的相关做法，但还是有问题：
假如现在有a、b、c三个服务，在a服务里顺序调用b、c服务，b、c服务都配置了降级方法，并且在降级方法里配置了回滚：GlobalTransactionContext.reload(RootContext.getXID()).rollback();
@wangwei-ying
现在是在调用b服务时超时了，可能是因为异常信息被feign处理掉了，seata感知不到，这时会继续调用c服务，但是在c服务里面尝试获取全局事务ID：RootContext.getXID(); 是获取不到的，感觉是没注册到，所以就导致c服务里面的事务自己本地提交了，而a、b服务的事务都回滚了

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

有什么办法能让c服务不被继续调用到，或者能让c服务的事务被回滚呢？

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version :1.8
  • OS :windoes 10
  • Others: seata1.1.0

node.title: get global lock fail, xid:xxx:8091:9205983199890188,lockKeys:sg_storage:7564566
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

io.seata.rm.datasource.exec.LockConflictException: get global lock fail

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

我在尝试对两个服务（分布式）之间做并发压力测试时，遇到了此问题，翻阅过Seata的官方文档后，更改了 ：

  1. client.rm.lock.retryPolicyBranchRollbackOnConflict=false

2.client.rm.lock.retryInterval=300 (间隔300毫秒)

3.client.rm.lock.retryTimes=200（重试200次）

4.查看了row_key的长度，没有问题，因为我已经将其改为了text

5.单个接口测试下没有问题，现在是并发200，出现了此问题 。

========================================
但是我在查看日志时，发现并没有生效，程序很快就报错了 。
因此有些不解，困扰了挺久

* org.springframework.transaction.TransactionSystemException: Could not commit JDBC transaction; nested exception is io.seata.rm.datasource.exec.LockConflictException: get global lock fail, pullRequest.title: optimize: `JacksonUndoLogParser` supports to parsing `LocalDateTime`

mergeCommit.message: optimize: `JacksonUndoLogParser` supports to parsing `LocalDateTime` (#3738)

node.title: mysql驱动8.0时，JacksonUndoLogParser 反序列化报错
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

  mysql驱动8.0时，JacksonUndoLogParser 反序列化报错。数据库类型datetime会被映射为LocalDateTime类型

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

 mysql驱动8.0时，数据库类型datetime会被映射为LocalDateTime类型。 JacksonUndoLogParser在反序列化时无法处理导致异常

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

mysql驱动8.0时   数据也能正常序列化和反序列化到数据库

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version : 11
  • OS : mac os
  • Others: mysql驱动 8.0

node.title: LocalDateTime转换异常，springboot版本：2.4.4

node.title: seata 1.4.2 集成springboot项目 在启用consul配置中心的时候，项目无法完成启动，一直获取配置失败
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

最近项目中考虑引入seata作为分布式事务解决方案，最开始我们是用springboot的yml配置文件作为配置中心，并做了压测，效果符合理想，后来参照官网高可用部署方式，我们用consul作为配置中心，就出现问题了，业务项目启动不起来，一直卡在读取配置，就像这样：

ERROR 45365 --- [           main] io.seata.config.ConfigFuture             : config operation timeout,cost:5000 ms,op:GET,dataId:transport.threadFactory.workerThreadPrefix
ERROR 45365 --- [           main] io.seata.config.ConfigFuture             : config operation timeout,cost:5003 ms,op:GET,dataId:transport.threadFactory.shareBossWorker
ERROR 45365 --- [           main] io.seata.config.ConfigFuture             : config operation timeout,cost:5000 ms,op:GET,dataId:transport.type
ERROR 45365 --- [           main] io.seata.config.ConfigFuture             : config operation timeout,cost:5001 ms,op:GET,dataId:transport.threadFactory.workerThreadSize

上面这个错误，断点调试 发现最开始是在SpringBootConfigurationProvider#get(dataId) 里面 获取 ConfigConsulProperties.class 这个bean 的时候卡住一段时间，大概有30秒，导致没有及时获取到consul连接配置，consul客户端没有及时完成初始化，这导致读取consul服务上配置数据超时失败，但是疑惑的是，后来consul客户端完成了初始化后，consul客户端从注册中心获取seata服务确总是失败，一直出现下面的错误，无法完成启动

ERROR 45365 --- [eoutChecker_2_1] i.s.c.r.netty.NettyClientChannelManager  : no available service found in cluster 'kun-ming', please make sure registry config correct and keep your seata server running
ERROR 45365 --- [eoutChecker_1_1] i.s.c.r.netty.NettyClientChannelManager  : no available service found in cluster 'kun-ming', please make sure registry config correct and keep your seata server running

我们事务组的配置如下：
service.vgroupMapping.ji9_tx_group = kun-ming

注册中心该服务其实是存在的

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

我期望这个错误不应该存在，应该按照配置，能够在注册中心找到服务，期望这个问题尽快修复

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

最后我在ConsulRegisttryServiceImpl#refreshCluster(cluster) 方法中发现了问题，
refreshCluster(cluster) -调用-> getHealthyServices(getClusterName(), -1, -1)
其实getHealthService方法的service 参数应该使用上层方法refreshCluster(cluster) 传入的cluster 参数，而不应该从getClusterName() 获取服务名，因为getClusterName()获取的服务名是本地文件配置的。

  1. xxx
  2. xxx
  3. xxx

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version : 1.8
  • OS : centos 8
  • Others:
    seata: seata-spring-boot-starter 1.4.2
    springboot: 2.3.10.RELEASE
    配置中心: consul
    注册中心: consul

node.title: ZK 注册中心在lookup 服务地址时每次都会检查zk节点是否存在
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

ZK 注册中心在lookup 服务地址时每次都会检查zk节点是否存在，在并发高的时候zk压力随之增高。

    /**
     * @param key the key
     * @return
     * @throws Exception
     */
    @Override
    public List<InetSocketAddress> lookup(String key) throws Exception {
        String clusterName = getServiceGroup(key);

        if (clusterName == null) {
            return null;
        }

        return doLookup(clusterName);
    }

    // visible for test.
    List<InetSocketAddress> doLookup(String clusterName) throws Exception {
        boolean exist = getClientInstance().exists(ROOT_PATH + clusterName); // 这里会直连 zk
        if (!exist) {
            return null;
        }

        if (!LISTENER_SERVICE_MAP.containsKey(clusterName)) {
            List<String> childClusterPath = getClientInstance().getChildren(ROOT_PATH + clusterName);
            refreshClusterAddressMap(clusterName, childClusterPath);
            subscribeCluster(clusterName);
        }

        return CLUSTER_ADDRESS_MAP.get(clusterName);
    }

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

If there is an exception, please attach the exception trace:

Just paste your stack trace here!

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

获取集群列表，不需要每次都查询 zk

node.title: Some improvments abount TCC are in planning or in progress?
node.bodyHTML:
1. In AT mode, seata prevents resources from suspending, as well as unnecessary rollback. e.g:
    first. TC- Rollback -> RM
    second. TM - do sth -> RM
    I found it not be taken to account in TCC mode. Is it better to implement it in business code ? Or should seata handle it?

  2. In additional, I'd like to code the commit/rollback methods without parameter BusinessActionContext, other parameters should be "auto-wired":

boolean rollback(@XxxParameter("opId") long opId){
    ...
}

node.title: io.seata.common.util.StringUtils#toString可能会导致StackOverFlowError
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

when i tried to toString io.seata.core.model.GlobalStatus by using io.seata.common.util.StringUtils#toString, i got a StackOverFlowError.

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

The reason that cause this StackOverFlowError is: If a class A has some Fields like Map or Collection, and the elements of Map or Collextion are the instance of A, we will get a StackOverFlowError when invoke io.seata.common.util.StringUtils#toString method.
For example: following is the class A

class A {
  private static final List<A> LIST = new ArrayList<>();
  static {
    LIST.add(new A());
  }
  public A(){}
}

Following code snippet is the rootCause:

if (obj instanceof Collection) {
    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
    sb.append("[");
    if (!((Collection) obj).isEmpty()) {
        for (Object o : (Collection) obj) {
            sb.append(toString(o)).append(",");
        }
        sb.deleteCharAt(sb.length() - 1);
    }
    sb.append("]");
    return sb.toString();
}
if (obj instanceof Map) {
    Map<Object, Object> map = (Map) obj;
    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
    sb.append("{");
    if (!map.isEmpty()) {
        // if key or value is instance of A, here will cause infinite recursion, so we get a StackOverFlowError
        map.forEach((key, value) -> {
            sb.append(toString(key)).append("->")
                    .append(toString(value)).append(",");
        });
        sb.deleteCharAt(sb.length() - 1);
    }
    sb.append("}");
    return sb.toString();
}

If there is an exception, please attach the exception trace:

java.lang.StackOverflowError: null
	at io.seata.common.util.StringUtils.toString(StringUtils.java:227) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.common.util.StringUtils.lambda$toString$0(StringUtils.java:207) ~[classes/:na]
	at java.base/java.util.HashMap.forEach(HashMap.java:1336) ~[na:na]
	at io.seata.common.util.StringUtils.toString(StringUtils.java:195) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.common.util.StringUtils.toString(StringUtils.java:227) ~[classes/:na]

node.title: Inccorect BOM definition
node.bodyHTML:
BOM, aka Bill-of-Material, is a "pom" type artifact that declare all modules with version of current component.
Commonly, BOMs should NOT contain declarations not belong to current component.
However, seata-bom imports spring-framework-bom and declares all dependencies seata use except the seata modules.
This is really a bad practice and it breaks the semantic of BOM!

node.title: postgresql   JDBC连接多Schema导致undo_log表无法清空
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

使用如下JDBC URL连接 postgresql 数据库
jdbc:postgresql://ip:port/db?currentSchema=schema1,commonschema
jdbc:postgresql://ip:port/db?currentSchema=schema2,commonschema

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

导致ChannelManager#dbKeytoSet 方法在拆分字符串时出现错误(Constants.DBKEYS_SPLIT_CHAR = ",")。
使得与RM无法通讯，undo_log表无法清空
源码如下：

private static Set<String> dbKeytoSet(String dbkey) {
        if (StringUtils.isNullOrEmpty(dbkey)) {
            return null;
        }
        return new HashSet<String>(Arrays.asList(dbkey.split(Constants.DBKEYS_SPLIT_CHAR)));
    }

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

应使用其它分隔符，目前我自己修改源码，使用“,,”作为分隔符（String DBKEYS_SPLIT_CHAR = ",,";）

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version : Java 8
  • OS : CentOs 7
  • Others: postgresql 数据库

node.title: FastjsonUndoLogParser 关于 datatime 类型的bug 导致事务不能回滚
node.bodyHTML:
1. 问题

当使用 fastjson 序列化 undoLog 时, 对于 datetime 类型的字段会导致事务回滚操作失败。通过阅读源码，发现 seata 的 DataCompareUtils.convertType 方法，未针对 java8 的 LocalDateTime 做特殊处理。在 jdbc 8.x 驱动中，对于 datetime 类型会自动映射为java 的 LocalDateTime 类型，而 FastJson 对其序列化格式为: yyyy:MM:ddTHH:mm:ss。
而在执行回滚操作时，在比较 Field 类型时，使用 TimeStamp.valueOf(String) 方法会抛出异常，导致事务无法回滚。

2. 数据库中 rollback_info 字段值

{"branchId":8737137583306362964,"sqlUndoLogs":[{"afterImage":{"rows":[{"fields":[{"keyType":"PRIMARY_KEY","name":"id","type":-5,"value":1414624248579997696},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"create_time","type":93,"value":"2021-07-12T16:34:38"},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"update_time","type":93,"value":"2021-07-12T16:34:38"},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"version","type":4,"value":1},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"del","type":-7,"value":false},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"user_id","type":-5,"value":1414596331305070592},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"type","type":-6,"value":1},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"amount_before","type":3,"value":760.00},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"amount","type":3,"value":10.00},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"amount_after","type":3,"value":750.00},{"keyType":"NULL","name":"description","type":12,"value":"扣减"}]}],"tableName":"t_account_detail"},"beforeImage":{"rows":[],"tableName":"t_account_detail"},"sqlType":"INSERT","tableName":"t_account_detail"}],"xid":"172.17.0.1:8091:8737137583306362957"}

java内存

3. 修改方案

DataCompareUtils.convertType 方法需添加对 LocalDateTime 类型的处理逻辑

pullRequest.title: feature: support TLS transmission encryption

node.title: [Summer 2021] Enhance application protection capability of Seata-Server
node.bodyHTML:
Background

Generally speaking, the use of Seata-Server on a small scale in the Intranet will not expose security problems. However, as the scale of the business expands, it may be challenged by improper use and illegal access, triggering such problems as traffic overload, malicious access, packet leakage and so on.

The Seata community wants to open the task of improving the protection of Seata-Server applications to Summer 2021.

Target

The goal of this issue is to improve the application protection capability of Seata-Server.

Difficulty

Medium

Mentor

@slievrly
jimin.jm@alibaba-inc.com

Output Requirements

  • Support TLS transmission encryption.
  • Support Server authentication blacklist configuration.
  • Support flow limiting control for a single Server. Full limited flow control is optional.

Technical Requirements

  • Familiar with Java programming language.
  • Understand common design patterns
  • Ability to read source code

————————————————————————

背景

一般来说在内网小规模使用Seata-Server并不会暴露安全性问题，但是随着业务的规模的扩大，可能受到不当使用，非法访问等问题挑战，触发例如流量过载，恶意访问，数据包泄露等问题。

Seata 社区想将这个提升Seata-Server应用防护的任务开放给 Summer 2021。

目标

提升 Seata-Server 的应用防护能力。

难度

中等

导师

@slievrly
jimin.jm@alibaba-inc.com

产出要求

  • 支持TLS加密传输。
  • 支持Seata-Server 访问黑名单控制。
  • 支持单个Server的流量控制。全局限流是可选项。

能力要求

  • 熟悉Java开发语言。
  • 理解常见设计模式。
  • 具备一定的源码阅读能力

pullRequest.title: [WIP] Improving the phase-two performance of TCC mode

node.title: [Summer2021] Improving the phase-two performance of TCC mode
node.bodyHTML:
Background

At present, the TCC mode only supports synchronous rollback, but in some scenarios, some TCC branches can be rollback asynchronously.
Reduce the cost of global rollback.

The Seata community wants to open the task to Summer 2021.

Target

In TCC mode, the phase-two rollback can be asynchronous.

Difficulty

Medium

Mentor

@wangliang181230
841369634@qq.com

Output Requirements

  • TCC annotation, add a field for the type of rollback. The default value is synchronous rollback.
  • When the TCC branch is registered, the type of rollback is submitted to Seata-Server together.
  • When Seata-Server global rollback, if the type of rollback is asynchronous rollback, skip the branch and let a thread named asyncRollbacking rollback the branch.

Technical Requirements

  • Familiar with Java programming language.
  • Understand common design patterns
  • Ability to read source code

————————————————————————

背景

目前TCC模式只支持同步回滚，但是在部分场景下，部分TCC分支是可以异步回滚的。
降低全局回滚的时间成本。

Seata 社区想将这个任务开放给 Summer 2021。

目标

在TCC模式下，二阶段回滚操作可异步化。

难度

中等

导师

@wangliang181230
841369634@qq.com

产出要求

  • TCC的注解，添加回滚方式的字段，默认：同步回滚。
  • TCC分支注册时，将回滚方式一同提交到Seata-Server。
  • Seata-Server全局回滚时，如果分支的回滚方式为异步回滚，则跳过该分支，留到异步定时任务来处理回滚。

能力要求

  • 熟悉Java开发语言。
  • 理解常见设计模式。
  • 具备一定的源码阅读能力。

pullRequest.title: feature: Integrate RocketMQ into Seata

node.title: [Summer2021] Integrate `RocketMQ` into `Seata`
node.bodyHTML:
Background

In a distributed transaction, there may be many types of transaction resources involved. In order to achieve the consistency of distributed transactions, all types of transaction resources must be managed.
In this task, we expect to use TCC mode to integrate RocketMQ into Seata.

The Seata community wants to open the task to Summer 2021.

Target

Use TCC mode to integrate RocketMQ into Seata.

Difficulty

Medium

Mentor

@wangliang181230
841369634@qq.com

Output Requirements

  • Use the proxy mode to proxy the RocketMQ bean.
  • In the proxy, use TCC mode to integrate RocketMQ into Seata.

Technical Requirements

  • Familiar with Java programming language.
  • Understand common design patterns
  • Ability to read source code

————————————————————————

背景

在一个分布式事务中，可能会有多种类型的事务资源参与进来，为了达到分布式事务一致性，必须将所有类型的事务资源都管理起来。
此次任务，期望使用TCC模式，将RocketMQ整合到Seata中。

Seata 社区想将这个任务开放给 Summer 2021。

目标

使用TCC模式，将RocketMQ整合到Seata中。

难度

中等

导师

@wangliang181230
841369634@qq.com

产出要求

  • 使用代理模式，代理掉RocketMQ的Bean。
  • 在代理中，使用TCC模式，将RocketMQ整合到Seata中。

能力要求

  • 熟悉Java开发语言。
  • 理解常见设计模式。
  • 具备一定的源码阅读能力。

node.title: seata集群，全局事务提交的时候，redis的事务报错：返回null
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

If there is an exception, please attach the exception trace:

如上图。由于WATCH本身的作用是“监视key是否被改动过”，而且支持同时监视多个key，只要还没真正触发事务，WATCH都会尽职尽责的监视，一旦发现某个key被修改了，在执行EXEC时就会返回nil，表示事务无法触发。
分析：被 其他 tc 抢先执行了， watch 的全局事务key的value 已经被改了，导致EXEC返回值为null， 这个 tc 报错

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

对EXEC返回值 做null判断，如果为null，则日志记录“已经被其他tc执行了”；不为null，则继续。

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

node.title: all_cons_columns查出的主键名和all_indexes中的索引名字不一致导致事物异常
node.bodyHTML:
Ⅰ. Issue Description

事物启动异常

Ⅱ. Describe what happened


如图：构造tablemeta信息时，通过两个sql查询表的相关索引信息，在图中1的位置，通过查询all_indexes取得所有的索引，
[在图中2，3位置通过查询all_cons_columns设置主键，但是由于all_indexes查出来的信息不包含all_cons_columns查出来的信息，就导致没有执行到第3步。
查询数据库的索引信息如下图：


查询的sql是根据debug整理出来的：
select null as table_cat,
owner as table_schem,
table_name,
0 as NON_UNIQUE,
null as index_qualifier,
null as index_name, 0 as type,
0 as ordinal_position, null as column_name,
null as asc_or_desc,
num_rows as cardinality,
blocks as pages,
null as filter_condition
from all_tables
where table_name = '表名'
and owner = '数据库名'
union
select null as table_cat,
i.owner as table_schem,
i.table_name,
decode (i.uniqueness, 'UNIQUE', 0, 1),
null as index_qualifier,
i.index_name,
1 as type,
c.column_position as ordinal_position,
c.column_name,
null as asc_or_desc,
i.distinct_keys as cardinality,
i.leaf_blocks as pages,
null as filter_condition
from all_indexes i, all_ind_columns c
where i.table_name = '表名'
and i.owner = '数据库名'
and i.index_name = c.index_name
and i.table_owner = c.table_owner
and i.table_name = c.table_name
and i.owner = c.index_owner
order by non_unique, type, index_name, ordinal_position
;
SELECT NULL AS table_cat,
c.owner AS table_schem,
c.table_name,
c.column_name,
c.position AS key_seq,
c.constraint_name AS pk_name
FROM all_cons_columns c, all_constraints k
WHERE k.constraint_type = 'P'
AND k.table_name = '表名'
AND k.owner like '数据库名' escape '/'
AND k.constraint_name = c.constraint_name
AND k.table_name = c.table_name
AND k.owner = c.owner
ORDER BY column_name;

node.title: Service address exploration of the registry center
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe in details

In some cases, for example, the TC has registered 127.0.0.1:8091 to the registry center or the registered IP is unable to communicate with the client. In this case, the health detection result of the registry center is that the TC is alive, but the network cannot be connected to the client, so it is necessary to explore the service list of the registry center and remove the TC that the client cannot communicate;

How it could be?

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. You can explain more about input of the feature, and output of it.

node.title: 事务结束时没有清空RpcContext中的事务ID
node.bodyHTML: 事务结束时只清空了本地RootContext中的事务ID，而没有清空RpcContext中的事务ID，导致A事务结束后同一个线程中再去RPC调用其他服务B，A依然会从RpcContext中传递事务ID，而下B服务拿着这个事务ID去 seata-server 中查找不到（被A服务事务结束时删掉了），导致异常

node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

19:36:58.442  INFO --- [SpringContextShutdownHook] o.s.s.concurrent.ThreadPoolTaskExecutor  : Shutting down ExecutorService 'applicationTaskExecutor'
19:37:00.965 ERROR --- [             ShutdownHook] i.s.core.rpc.netty.NettyServerBootstrap  : shutdown execute error:org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.context.AnnotationConfigServletWebServerApplicationContext@5a4c638d has been closed already
==>
java.lang.IllegalStateException: org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.context.AnnotationConfigServletWebServerApplicationContext@5a4c638d has been closed already
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.assertBeanFactoryActive(AbstractApplicationContext.java:1093) ~[spring-context-5.2.14.RELEASE.jar:5.2.14.RELEASE]
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.getBean(AbstractApplicationContext.java:1126) ~[spring-context-5.2.14.RELEASE.jar:5.2.14.RELEASE]
	at io.seata.spring.boot.autoconfigure.provider.SpringBootConfigurationProvider.get(SpringBootConfigurationProvider.java:100) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.spring.boot.autoconfigure.provider.SpringBootConfigurationProvider.get(SpringBootConfigurationProvider.java:85) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.spring.boot.autoconfigure.provider.SpringBootConfigurationProvider.access$200(SpringBootConfigurationProvider.java:46) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.spring.boot.autoconfigure.provider.SpringBootConfigurationProvider$1.intercept(SpringBootConfigurationProvider.java:61) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.config.FileConfiguration$$EnhancerByCGLIB$$862af1eb.getConfig(<generated>) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.discovery.registry.nacos.NacosRegistryServiceImpl.getServiceName(NacosRegistryServiceImpl.java:214) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.discovery.registry.nacos.NacosRegistryServiceImpl.unregister(NacosRegistryServiceImpl.java:92) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.NettyServerBootstrap.shutdown(NettyServerBootstrap.java:187) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.AbstractNettyRemotingServer.destroy(AbstractNettyRemotingServer.java:126) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.core.rpc.ShutdownHook$DisposablePriorityWrapper.destroy(ShutdownHook.java:113) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.core.rpc.ShutdownHook.destroyAll(ShutdownHook.java:82) ~[classes/:na]
	at io.seata.core.rpc.ShutdownHook.run(ShutdownHook.java:66) ~[classes/:na]
<==

1.5.0-snapshot下,seata-server是利用applicationcontext获取配置,而runtime.shutdownhook是异步进行,导致spring容器关闭后,才去做相关操作,导致注册中心主动下线服务失败
Under 1.5.0-snapshot, seata-server uses applicationcontext to obtain configuration, and runtime.shutdownhook is performed asynchronously, which causes the spring container to be closed before performing related operations, which causes the registry to actively offline service failure

node.title: RM执行本地事务抛出异常之后，没有执行清除xid，导致线程一直绑定着错误请求的xid
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

AT模式
RM执行本地事务操作时出现异常，发现 RootContext的CONTEXT_HOLDER内线程对应的XID没有被清除，
跟踪发现没有执行以下两个地方的清除xid代码：
· io.seata.integration.http.TransactionPropagationInterceptor#postHandle
· io.seata.integration.http.HttpHandlerExceptionResolver#doResolveException

导致线程池内的线程处理完成请求之后回收到池内，但是依然在RootContext的CONTEXT_HOLDER关联了一个XID，出现的问题如下：
新的GlobalTransaction进来时执行io.seata.integration.http.TransactionPropagationInterceptor#preHandle方法的如下代码时：
`

@Override
public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) {
    String xid = RootContext.getXID();
    String rpcXid = request.getHeader(RootContext.KEY_XID);

    if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
        LOGGER.debug("xid in RootContext[{}] xid in HttpContext[{}]", xid, rpcXid);
    }
    if (**xid == null && rpcXid != null**) {
        RootContext.bind(rpcXid);
        if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
            LOGGER.debug("bind[{}] to RootContext", rpcXid);
        }
    }

    return true;
}

当上次出现异常的线程再次从Pool被分配来处理一个新的@GlobalTransaction请求时，由于从RootContext内已经获取得到xid， 按 TransactionPropagationInterceptor#preHandle 的逻辑，这时候会忽略从Header带进来的xid（request.getHeader(RootContext.KEY_XID)） 带着Context内绑定的旧xid执行本地事务，当执行完成需要注册分支事务时，由于xid是旧的，会导致抛出这个错误：
Could not found global transaction xid = （旧xid）, may be has finished
`

我们项目内有 @RestControllerAdvice 处理的全局异常处理（但是处理时正常返回Response 并未Throw Exception）：
`

@RestControllerAdvice
public class LepuRestExceptionHandler {

@ExceptionHandler(Throwable.class)
@ResponseStatus(HttpStatus.OK)
public R handleError(Throwable e) {
    log.error("服务器异常", e);
    return R.fail(ResultCode.INTERFACE_INNER_INVOKE_ERROR, ResultCode.INTERFACE_INNER_INVOKE_ERROR.getMessage());
}

`

注：我在Isses内有发现不少 Could not found global transaction xid = xxx, may be has finished 的问题，但是没有提到我上述的这种场景，是否是我这边的用法不对？

经过测试 发现异常走了 @RestControllerAdvice 处理之后转换成普通的Result，就到不了HttpHandlerExceptionResolver。

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

If there is an exception, please attach the exception trace:

Just paste your stack trace here!

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

  1. xxx

  3. xxx

node.title: [Summer 2021] Enhance application protection capability of Seata-Server
node.bodyHTML:
Background

Generally speaking, the use of Seata-Server on a small scale in the Intranet will not expose security problems. However, as the scale of the business expands, it may be challenged by improper use and illegal access, triggering such problems as traffic overload, malicious access, packet leakage and so on.

The Seata community wants to open the task of improving the protection of Seata-Server applications to Summer 2021.

Target

The goal of this issue is to improve the application protection capability of Seata-Server.

Difficulty

Medium

Mentor

@slievrly
jimin.jm@alibaba-inc.com

Output Requirements

  • Support TLS transmission encryption.
  • Support Server authentication blacklist configuration.
  • Support flow limiting control for a single Server. Full limited flow control is optional.

Technical Requirements

  • Familiar with Java programming language.
  • Understand common design patterns
  • Ability to read source code

————————————————————————

背景

一般来说在内网小规模使用Seata-Server并不会暴露安全性问题，但是随着业务的规模的扩大，可能受到不当使用，非法访问等问题挑战，触发例如流量过载，恶意访问，数据包泄露等问题。

Seata 社区想将这个提升Seata-Server应用防护的任务开放给 Summer 2021。

目标

提升 Seata-Server 的应用防护能力。

难度

中等

导师

@slievrly
jimin.jm@alibaba-inc.com

产出要求

  • 支持TLS加密传输。
  • 支持Seata-Server 访问黑名单控制。
  • 支持单个Server的流量控制。全局限流是可选项。

能力要求

  • 熟悉Java开发语言。
  • 理解常见设计模式。
  • 具备一定的源码阅读能力

node.title: XA模式资源悬挂问题
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

XA模式资源悬挂问题

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

XA模式下，TC日志分布式事务回滚成功，实际上数据库中的分支事务未回滚，导致资源永远无法处理。

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

TC日志记录的分布式事务回滚成功，数据库中的分支事务也应该回滚成功。

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

TM注册一个分布式事务到TC

RM注册一个分支事务到TC

但是RM还没有执行xa end，就因为超时，TC发起执行了xa rollback

这时候因为隔离性，xa rollback会抛出一个异常XAException.XAER_NOTA，无效的xid

TC认为rollback成功，删除掉branch_table的数据

这时候RM的xa end执行完毕，数据库出现不一致的bug

流程

TM RM TC

注册分布式事务

​ 分布式事务注册成功

​ xa start 123;

​ 分布式事务超时回滚

​ xa rollback 123;

​ 分布式事务回滚成功

​ xa end 123;

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

问题代码

我的理解就是下面的代码导致的这个bug

但是这里涉及到另外一个问题：#2971

直接删除掉这段代码又会导致TC无限重试扽问题

private BranchStatus finishBranch(boolean committed, BranchType branchType, String xid, long branchId, String resourceId,
                                   String applicationData) throws TransactionException {
    XAXid xaBranchXid = XAXidBuilder.build(xid, branchId);
    Resource resource = dataSourceCache.get(resourceId);
    if (resource instanceof AbstractDataSourceProxyXA) {
        try (ConnectionProxyXA connectionProxyXA = ((AbstractDataSourceProxyXA)resource).getConnectionForXAFinish(xaBranchXid)) {
            if (committed) {
                connectionProxyXA.xaCommit(xid, branchId, applicationData);
                LOGGER.info(xaBranchXid + " was committed.");
                return BranchStatus.PhaseTwo_Committed;
            } else {
                connectionProxyXA.xaRollback(xid, branchId, applicationData);
                LOGGER.info(xaBranchXid + " was rollbacked");
                return BranchStatus.PhaseTwo_Rollbacked;
            }
        } catch (XAException | SQLException sqle) {
            //我的理解这个问题就是因为这一段代码导致的 
            if (sqle instanceof XAException) {
                if (((XAException)sqle).errorCode == XAException.XAER_NOTA) {
                    if (committed) {
                        return BranchStatus.PhaseTwo_Committed;
                    } else {
                        return BranchStatus.PhaseTwo_Rollbacked;
                    }
                }
            }
            if (committed) {
                LOGGER.info(xaBranchXid + " commit failed since " + sqle.getMessage(), sqle);
                // FIXME: case of PhaseTwo_CommitFailed_Unretryable
                return BranchStatus.PhaseTwo_CommitFailed_Retryable;
            } else {
                LOGGER.info(xaBranchXid + " rollback failed since " + sqle.getMessage(), sqle);
                // FIXME: case of PhaseTwo_RollbackFailed_Unretryable
                return BranchStatus.PhaseTwo_RollbackFailed_Retryable;
            }
        }
    } else {
        LOGGER.error("Unknown Resource for XA resource " + resourceId + " " + resource);
        if (committed) {
            return BranchStatus.PhaseTwo_CommitFailed_Unretryable;
        } else {
            return BranchStatus.PhaseTwo_RollbackFailed_Unretryable;
        }
    }
}

问题重现

node.title: The collection may not be in use when a branch transaction registers to acquire the lock
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

This may help the GC work better

How it could be?

This is the code snippet in AbstractLockManager

    protected List<RowLock> collectRowLocks(BranchSession branchSession) {
        List<RowLock> locks = new ArrayList<>();
        if (branchSession == null || StringUtils.isBlank(branchSession.getLockKey())) {
            return locks;
        }

        String lockKey = branchSession.getLockKey();
        String resourceId = branchSession.getResourceId();
        String xid = branchSession.getXid();
        long transactionId = branchSession.getTransactionId();
        long branchId = branchSession.getBranchId();

        return collectRowLocks(lockKey, resourceId, xid, transactionId, branchId);
    }

This looks like the collection may not being used，Can we change it like this？Will this help GC？

protected List<RowLock> collectRowLocks(BranchSession branchSession) {
        if (branchSession == null || StringUtils.isBlank(branchSession.getLockKey())) {
            return new ArrayList<>();
        }

        String lockKey = branchSession.getLockKey();
        String resourceId = branchSession.getResourceId();
        String xid = branchSession.getXid();
        long transactionId = branchSession.getTransactionId();
        long branchId = branchSession.getBranchId();

        return collectRowLocks(lockKey, resourceId, xid, transactionId, branchId);
    }

Other related information

Thanks for comment

node.title: 1.4.2 springboot 启动过程中 'main' 和 'timeoutChecker' 线程的死锁重现了
node.bodyHTML:
Ⅰ. Issue Description

我在使用io.seata:seata-spring-boot-starter:1.4.2的时候,springboot 启动过程中 'main' 线程 和 'timeoutChecker' 线程发生死锁,原因是SpringBootConfigurationProvider间接进行Spring上下文的依赖查找.

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

pullRequest.title: optimize: remote configuration reading

node.title: optimize concurrent processing of the cache layer
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe in details
优化缓存层的读写
optimize read and write of the cache layer

How it could be?

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. You can explain more about input of the feature, and output of it.
    public Configuration proxy(Configuration originalConfiguration) {
        return (Configuration)Enhancer.create(Configuration.class,
            (MethodInterceptor)(proxy, method, args, methodProxy) -> {
                if (method.getName().startsWith(METHOD_PREFIX)
                        && !method.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(METHOD_LATEST_CONFIG)) {
                    String rawDataId = (String)args[0];
                    ObjectWrapper wrapper = CONFIG_CACHE.get(rawDataId);
                    String type = method.getName().substring(METHOD_PREFIX.length());
                    if (!ObjectWrapper.supportType(type)) {
                        type = null;
                    }
                    if (null == wrapper) {
                        Object result = method.invoke(originalConfiguration, args);
                        // The wrapper.data only exists in the cache when it is not null.
                        if (result != null) {
                            wrapper = new ObjectWrapper(result, type);
                            CONFIG_CACHE.put(rawDataId, wrapper);
                        }
                    }
                    return wrapper == null ? null : wrapper.convertData(type);
                }
                return method.invoke(originalConfiguration, args);
            });
    }

可以看到以上代码,如果并发获取值时,值不存在,会同时去配置中心读数据并写入缓存,应该加一个双检锁来处理
As you can see from the above code, when the value is fetched concurrently, if the value does not exist, the data is read from the configuration center and written to the cache at the same time.A double-checked lock should be added to handle this problem

Other related information

Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

node.title: xa模式获取channel导致的资源悬挂问题
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

xa模式，获取channel导致的资源悬挂问题

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

XA模式下，TC日志分布式事务回滚成功，实际上数据库中的分支事务未回滚，导致资源永远无法处理。

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

TC日志记录的分布式事务回滚成功，数据库中的分支事务也应该回滚成功。

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

order，account，storage三个服务，resource_id是相同的，也就是相同数据库，不同应用的场景下

1.开启了一个全局事务
2.然后order和tm的channel断了
3.tm会选择一个resource_id相同的服务，作为替代，比如account
4.发生xaer_note的异常，最终会发生资源悬挂的问题。

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

    public static Channel getChannel(String resourceId, String clientId) {
        Channel resultChannel = null;

        String[] clientIdInfo = readClientId(clientId);

        if (clientIdInfo == null || clientIdInfo.length != 3) {
            throw new FrameworkException("Invalid Client ID: " + clientId);
        }

        String targetApplicationId = clientIdInfo[0];
        String targetIP = clientIdInfo[1];
        int targetPort = Integer.parseInt(clientIdInfo[2]);

        ConcurrentMap<String, ConcurrentMap<String, ConcurrentMap<Integer,
            RpcContext>>> applicationIdMap = RM_CHANNELS.get(resourceId);

        if (targetApplicationId == null || applicationIdMap == null ||  applicationIdMap.isEmpty()) {
            if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
                LOGGER.info("No channel is available for resource[{}]", resourceId);
            }
            return null;
        }

        ConcurrentMap<String, ConcurrentMap<Integer, RpcContext>> ipMap = applicationIdMap.get(targetApplicationId);

        if (ipMap != null && !ipMap.isEmpty()) {
            // Firstly, try to find the original channel through which the branch was registered.
            ConcurrentMap<Integer, RpcContext> portMapOnTargetIP = ipMap.get(targetIP);
            if (portMapOnTargetIP != null && !portMapOnTargetIP.isEmpty()) {
                RpcContext exactRpcContext = portMapOnTargetIP.get(targetPort);
                if (exactRpcContext != null) {
                    Channel channel = exactRpcContext.getChannel();
                    if (channel.isActive()) {
                        resultChannel = channel;
                        if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
                            LOGGER.debug("Just got exactly the one {} for {}", channel, clientId);
                        }
                    } else {
                        if (portMapOnTargetIP.remove(targetPort, exactRpcContext)) {
                            if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
                                LOGGER.info("Removed inactive {}", channel);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }

                // The original channel was broken, try another one.
                if (resultChannel == null) {
                    for (ConcurrentMap.Entry<Integer, RpcContext> portMapOnTargetIPEntry : portMapOnTargetIP
                        .entrySet()) {
                        Channel channel = portMapOnTargetIPEntry.getValue().getChannel();

                        if (channel.isActive()) {
                            resultChannel = channel;
                            if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
                                LOGGER.info(
                                    "Choose {} on the same IP[{}] as alternative of {}", channel, targetIP, clientId);
                            }
                            break;
                        } else {
                            if (portMapOnTargetIP.remove(portMapOnTargetIPEntry.getKey(),
                                portMapOnTargetIPEntry.getValue())) {
                                if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
                                    LOGGER.info("Removed inactive {}", channel);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }

            // No channel on the this app node, try another one.
            if (resultChannel == null) {
                for (ConcurrentMap.Entry<String, ConcurrentMap<Integer, RpcContext>> ipMapEntry : ipMap
                    .entrySet()) {
                    if (ipMapEntry.getKey().equals(targetIP)) { continue; }

                    ConcurrentMap<Integer, RpcContext> portMapOnOtherIP = ipMapEntry.getValue();
                    if (portMapOnOtherIP == null || portMapOnOtherIP.isEmpty()) {
                        continue;
                    }

                    for (ConcurrentMap.Entry<Integer, RpcContext> portMapOnOtherIPEntry : portMapOnOtherIP.entrySet()) {
                        Channel channel = portMapOnOtherIPEntry.getValue().getChannel();

                        if (channel.isActive()) {
                            resultChannel = channel;
                            if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
                                LOGGER.info("Choose {} on the same application[{}] as alternative of {}", channel, targetApplicationId, clientId);
                            }
                            break;
                        } else {
                            if (portMapOnOtherIP.remove(portMapOnOtherIPEntry.getKey(),
                                portMapOnOtherIPEntry.getValue())) {
                                if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
                                    LOGGER.info("Removed inactive {}", channel);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    if (resultChannel != null) { break; }
                }
            }
        }

        if (resultChannel == null) {
            resultChannel = tryOtherApp(applicationIdMap, targetApplicationId);

            if (resultChannel == null) {
                if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
                    LOGGER.info("No channel is available for resource[{}] as alternative of {}", resourceId, clientId);
                }
            } else {
                if (LOGGER.isInfoEnabled()) {
                    LOGGER.info("Choose {} on the same resource[{}] as alternative of {}", resultChannel, resourceId, clientId);
                }
            }
        }

        return resultChannel;

    }

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version : 1.8
  • Seata version: 1.4.2
  • OS :

node.title: Data remanence problems in lock and branch under specific circumstances
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

Data remanence is known to occur in the following cases
1.After lock acquisition the machine goes down，the lock data will remain
2.When the lock is obtained, the TC phase II rollback happens when the branch is registered, and the lock and branch will remain
If you want to fix it, please comment "Please assign it to me" is this issue.

1.lock获取到宕机，将残留lock数据
2.lock获取到，branch注册时刚好出现tc二阶段回滚，将残留lock和branch
如果你有兴趣修复这个问题的话, 请在下方留言 Please assign it to me

node.title: optimize request: optimize the lock logic when before image is empty
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe in details
for now, when acquire lock, seata will check whether the global lock has been holded by other global transaction. but for insert or part of insert ignore into(may be more), if the before image is empty, it means that the target rows is not exists when the current global transaction execute, so it can skip check lock and acquire lock directly.

当前Seata在执行acquire lock之前，都需要去检查当前的全局锁是否被其他全局事物持有。但是对于insert into或者部分的insert ignore into的操作，如果before image是空的，那也就意味着当前需要操作的行不存在的，也就不存在说当前的全局锁被其他全局事物所持有。因此当before image是空的时候，我们可以跳过check lock的步骤，直接执行插入全局锁即可。

How it could be?

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. You can explain more about input of the feature, and output of it.

Other related information

Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

当表的字段的字段被ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP修饰时。
对该单表进行操作时，在一个本地事务中先新增一条数据，再修改这条数据，后续若触发回滚，回滚将会失败，且不断重试。

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

仅仅贴出部分日志

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

要么正确回滚，要么就在运行时抛出异常不支持ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP。

Ⅳ. Cause Analysis

拿这个表来举例：

CREATE TABLE `order_tbl` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `as` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `money` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `create_time` timestamp ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`,`as`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=997133 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

首先回滚的顺序如下：先回滚update语句，再回滚insert语句。
在执行回update的undo SQL语句时，自动更新了create_time字段的时间。
接着准备执行insert语句的undo sql，此时需要将当前记录和afterImage进行比较。
问题就出在这里，因为create_time已经被污染了，无论如何都无法回滚

我暂时没想到好的解决方案，如果有思路的话，我可以提pr。

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version : 1.8
  • OS : windows
  • Others: seata 1.3.0

node.title: bug: store the actually updated field when onlyCareUpdateColumns is true
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

Currently, when onlyCareUpdateColumns is true, and the before/after image will only store the update rows in set condition, but sometimes, it will lost the fields that was auto update, like on update xxx in mysql.
So our idea is to store the fields that is actually being update

If you want to fix it, please comment "Please assign it to me" is this issue.

当前,如果onlyCareUpdateColumns=true, 然后seata的更新的前后镜像中只会记录在set表达式中写了的字段, 有些被自动更新的字段,则不会被记录到, 有可能会导致回滚时校验镜像失败. 因此, 期望在记录更新的前后镜像时, 是去记录真实被更新了的字段(set表达式中包含的字段 & 被数据库自动更新的字段)

如果你有兴趣修复这个问题的话, 请在下方留言 Please assign it to me

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

If there is an exception, please attach the exception trace:

Just paste your stack trace here!

pullRequest.title: optimize: Improve the performance of global commit and global rollback

mergeCommit.message: optimize: Improve the performance of global commit and global rollback (#4270)

nodes.message: optimize: let DefaultCoordinator invoke NettyRemotingServer 's close() method (#4300)

node.title: [Summer2021] Improve the performance of global commit and global rollback
node.bodyHTML:
Background

At present, branch transaction and global transaction are deleted synchronously when Seata-Server synchronously performs global commit or global rollback.
It is expected to asynchronize the deletion operation and reduce the time cost of global commit or global rollback.

The Seata community wants to open the task to Summer 2021.

Target

When global commit or global rollback, branch transaction and global transaction are deleted asynchronously.

Difficulty

Medium

Mentor

@wangliang181230
841369634@qq.com

Output Requirements

  • When global commit or rollback, when all branches are successful, the global transaction state changes to the 'finished' state first, and the branch data and global transaction data are deleted asynchronously.
  • During global commit or rollback, when a failed branch is encountered, the data of the previous successful branch is synchronously deleted in batch, and then the 'TM' initiates a retry.

Technical Requirements

  • Familiar with Java programming language.
  • Understand common design patterns
  • Ability to read source code

————————————————————————

背景

目前Seata-Server在同步执行全局提交或回滚时，分支数据和全局事务数据是同步删除的。
期望将删除操作异步化，降低全局提交或回滚的时间成本。

Seata 社区想将这个任务开放给 Summer 2021。

目标

全局提交或回滚时，分支数据和全局事务数据异步删除。

难度

中等

导师

@wangliang181230
841369634@qq.com

产出要求

  • 全局提交或回滚时，当所有分支全部成功时，全局事务状态先变更为Finished状态，分支数据和全局事务数据异步删除。
  • 全局提交或回滚时，当碰到执行失败的分支时，前面执行成功的分支数据做批量同步删除，然后由TM发起重试。

能力要求

  • 熟悉Java开发语言。
  • 理解常见设计模式。
  • 具备一定的源码阅读能力。

node.title: optimize build UndoItem logic
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

The under codes, it will query after image even the affected rows == 0.

如下代码，即使受影响条数==0的时候，也会在SQL执行完成之后去查询后镜像，但是这是一个无意义的操作。

    protected T executeAutoCommitFalse(Object[] args) throws Exception {
        if (!JdbcConstants.MYSQL.equalsIgnoreCase(getDbType()) && isMultiPk()) {
            throw new NotSupportYetException("multi pk only support mysql!");
        }
        TableRecords beforeImage = beforeImage();
        T result = statementCallback.execute(statementProxy.getTargetStatement(), args);
        TableRecords afterImage = afterImage(beforeImage);
        prepareUndoLog(beforeImage, afterImage);
        return result;
    }

How it could be?

when the affected rows==0, just return the result without doing somethings else.
当受影响条数==0的时候，可以立即返回，而不需要继续执行构建后镜像等操作。

Other related information

requirement: a pr to optimize & add the test case
要求：pr中需要包含代码优化以及对应的测试用例的补充

If you want to optimize it, please comment "Please assign it to me" in this issue.
如果有兴趣优化的，可以在下方留言please assign it to me

node.title: close() method in RedisRegistryServiceImpl was invoked twice during seata server shutting down
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

in version 1.5.0-SNAPSHOT
I start seata server in IDEA. I meet java.lang.IllegalStateException: Pool not open error log while shutting down seata server.
I use redis as registry center.

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

I see this error log

16:58:17.615 ERROR --- [SpringContextShutdownHook] i.s.core.rpc.netty.NettyServerBootstrap  : shutdown execute error:Could not get a resource from the pool
==>
redis.clients.jedis.exceptions.JedisConnectionException: Could not get a resource from the pool
	at redis.clients.jedis.util.Pool.getResource(Pool.java:59)
	at redis.clients.jedis.JedisPool.getResource(JedisPool.java:288)
	at io.seata.discovery.registry.redis.RedisRegistryServiceImpl.unregister(RedisRegistryServiceImpl.java:171)
	at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.NettyServerBootstrap.shutdown(NettyServerBootstrap.java:187)
	at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.AbstractNettyRemotingServer.destroy(AbstractNettyRemotingServer.java:126)
	at io.seata.server.ServerRunner.destroy(ServerRunner.java:75)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DisposableBeanAdapter.destroy(DisposableBeanAdapter.java:199)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.destroyBean(DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.java:587)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.destroySingleton(DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.java:559)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultListableBeanFactory.destroySingleton(DefaultListableBeanFactory.java:1092)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.destroySingletons(DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.java:520)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultListableBeanFactory.destroySingletons(DefaultListableBeanFactory.java:1085)
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.destroyBeans(AbstractApplicationContext.java:1061)
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.doClose(AbstractApplicationContext.java:1030)
	at org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.context.ServletWebServerApplicationContext.doClose(ServletWebServerApplicationContext.java:170)
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext$1.run(AbstractApplicationContext.java:949)
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalStateException: Pool not open
	at org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.BaseGenericObjectPool.assertOpen(BaseGenericObjectPool.java:770)
	at org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.GenericObjectPool.borrowObject(GenericObjectPool.java:407)
	at org.apache.commons.pool2.impl.GenericObjectPool.borrowObject(GenericObjectPool.java:354)
	at redis.clients.jedis.util.Pool.getResource(Pool.java:50)
	... 15 common frames omitted
<==


Process finished with exit code 130

I think we got this error because the RegistryService was destroyed twice.

I try to find out when RegistryService was closed first time. I changed the code like this,

public class RedisRegistryServiceImpl implements RegistryService<RedisListener> {

    @Override
    public void close() throws Exception {
        try {
            throw new RuntimeException("!!!");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            LOGGER.error("11", e);
        }
        jedisPool.destroy();
    }

}

now I know the first time the RegistryService was closed

16:58:13.599 ERROR --- [SpringContextShutdownHook] i.s.d.r.redis.RedisRegistryServiceImpl   : 11
==>
java.lang.RuntimeException: !!!
	at io.seata.discovery.registry.redis.RedisRegistryServiceImpl.close(RedisRegistryServiceImpl.java:238)
	at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.NettyServerBootstrap.shutdown(NettyServerBootstrap.java:188)
	at io.seata.core.rpc.netty.AbstractNettyRemotingServer.destroy(AbstractNettyRemotingServer.java:126)
	at io.seata.server.coordinator.DefaultCoordinator.destroy(DefaultCoordinator.java:463)
	at io.seata.server.ServerRunner.destroy(ServerRunner.java:75)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DisposableBeanAdapter.destroy(DisposableBeanAdapter.java:199)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.destroyBean(DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.java:587)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.destroySingleton(DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.java:559)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultListableBeanFactory.destroySingleton(DefaultListableBeanFactory.java:1092)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.destroySingletons(DefaultSingletonBeanRegistry.java:520)
	at org.springframework.beans.factory.support.DefaultListableBeanFactory.destroySingletons(DefaultListableBeanFactory.java:1085)
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.destroyBeans(AbstractApplicationContext.java:1061)
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext.doClose(AbstractApplicationContext.java:1030)
	at org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.context.ServletWebServerApplicationContext.doClose(ServletWebServerApplicationContext.java:170)
	at org.springframework.context.support.AbstractApplicationContext$1.run(AbstractApplicationContext.java:949)
<==

Obviously, RegistryService was closed from two place

  • first close from DefaultCoordinator
public class DefaultCoordinator extends AbstractTCInboundHandler implements TransactionMessageHandler, Disposable {
    @Override
    public void destroy() {
        // 1. first shutdown timed task
        retryRollbacking.shutdown();
        retryCommitting.shutdown();
        asyncCommitting.shutdown();
        timeoutCheck.shutdown();
        try {
            retryRollbacking.awaitTermination(TIMED_TASK_SHUTDOWN_MAX_WAIT_MILLS, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
            retryCommitting.awaitTermination(TIMED_TASK_SHUTDOWN_MAX_WAIT_MILLS, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
            asyncCommitting.awaitTermination(TIMED_TASK_SHUTDOWN_MAX_WAIT_MILLS, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
            timeoutCheck.awaitTermination(TIMED_TASK_SHUTDOWN_MAX_WAIT_MILLS, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
        } catch (InterruptedException ignore) {

        }
        // 2. second close netty flow
        if (remotingServer instanceof NettyRemotingServer) {
            ((NettyRemotingServer) remotingServer).destroy();  // first close!!!
        }
        // 3. last destroy SessionHolder
        SessionHolder.destroy();
    }
}
  • second close from NettyServerBootstrap
public class NettyServerBootstrap implements RemotingBootstrap {

    @Override
    public void shutdown() {
        try {
            if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
                LOGGER.debug("Shutting server down. ");
            }
            if (initialized.get()) {
                RegistryFactory.getInstance().unregister(new InetSocketAddress(XID.getIpAddress(), XID.getPort()));
                RegistryFactory.getInstance().close();  // second close here!!!
                //wait a few seconds for server transport
                TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(nettyServerConfig.getServerShutdownWaitTime());
            }

            this.eventLoopGroupBoss.shutdownGracefully();
            this.eventLoopGroupWorker.shutdownGracefully();
        } catch (Exception exx) {
            LOGGER.error("shutdown execute error:{}",exx.getMessage(),exx);
        }
    }
}

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

we need to optimize close() method in RedisRegistryServiceImpl

force it do close only once.

  1. shutdown threadPoolExecutor in it
  2. do unregister
  3. destroy JedisPool

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

  1. use redis as registry center
  2. stop server and check error log

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version : 1.8
  • Seata version: 1.5.0-SNAPSHOT
  • OS :

node.title: optimization after a unique index conflict occurs in undolog
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe in details

When a resource suspension occurs, an undolog with a status of 1 will be inserted to prevent resource suspension problems. When a unique index conflict occurs, a strategy should be adopted to delete the preventive undolog

资源防悬挂的策略是插入一条status为1的undolog，此时发生唯一索引冲突时，说明已经起到了防悬挂的作用，理论上应该放入一个队列中异步删除，避免出现大量的status=1的undolog

How it could be?

pullRequest.title: optimize:remove CompressUtil,optimize BranchSession's encode and decode logic

node.title: optimize compressUtil
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe in details

  1. io.seata.common.util.CompressUtil 和 io.seata.compressor.gzip.GzipCompressor 重合了，CompressUtil可以直接去掉
  2. CompressUtil比GzipCompressor多了个isCompressData的方法，有两种方案，a. 为Compressor的每个实现都添加isCompress的方法，然后直接把使用了isCompressData的地方迁移过去；b. 把用到了isCompressData的地方优化掉，可以把根据isCompressData判断数据是否被加密，改成加一个字节直接保存数据是否已加密会更好。

针对第2点的还有个问题，当前的支持的Compressor的对于是否被加密了，都是只能通过判断前2-4位的magic number来判断，不排除有一定的误判的可能性，虽然在当前的使用场景中不会出现问题，但是在客观上依然属于一个小问题，个人建议采用b方案。

如果有兴趣优化的，可以在下方留言please assign it to me

node.title: AT模式脏写校验异常
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

Insert类型SQL，当开启ONLY_CARE_UPDATE_COLUMNS配置项，SQL语句中显式写明插入主键字段，且数据库表的字段与SQL语句中写明的字段大小写不一致时，回滚会出现脏写校验异常（会误认为存在两个主键）
Example:insert into table_name (id) values(?);
”id“为table_name中的主键字段，且表中存储的字段为大写“ID”
则BaseTransactionalExecutor#buildTableRecords会出现重复添加字段的情况

Insert type SQL, when the ONLY_CARE_UPDATE_COLUMNS configuration item is enabled, the primary key field to be inserted is explicitly stated in the SQL statement, and the case of the fields of the database table is inconsistent with the field case specified in the SQL statement, a dirty write check exception will occur during rollback (will mistakenly think that there are two primary keys)
Example: insert into table_name (id) values(?);
”id“ is the primary key field in table_name, and the field stored in the table is an uppercase ”ID“
Then BaseTransactionalExecutor#buildTableRecords will repeatedly add fields

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

node.title: 事务回滚失败，mysql 使用 loadbalance 进行mysql 负载均衡，RM 调用发起回滚执行异常
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

事务回滚失败，mysql 使用 loadbalance 进行mysql 负载均衡，RM 调用发起回滚执行异常

Ⅱ. Describe what happened

微服务，基础框架：SpringCloud Alibaba 2021.1、数据连接池：Hikari（Druid 也不行），数据库mysql-cluster 8.0 版本，部署了 2个MYSQL 节点 2个 NDB节点，2个MGM管理节点，使用 Seata 作为分布式事务管理
数据库连接：jdbc:mysql:loadbalance://192.168.100.50:3306,192.168.100.51:3306/pinecone-cloud?roundRobinLoadBalance=true&rewriteBatchedStatements=true&allowMultiQueries=true&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF-8&useSSL=false

Bug发生经过：
客户端 -> 网关 -> A服务(事务发起者 TM) -> B服务（事务参与者 TC）抛出异常，A事务发起回滚，RM执行发起回滚，执行异常回滚
异常内容：io.seata.core.exception.TransactionException: java.lang.RuntimeException: rm client is not connected. dbkey:jdbc:mysql:loadbalance://192.168.100.50:3306,192.168.100.51:3306/pinecone-cloud,clientId:pinecone-system:192.168.100.221:58865

日志详见附件：

[seata-server.9200.all.log](https://github.com/seata/seata/files/7938831/seata-server.9200.all.log)

Ⅲ. Describe what you expected to happen

正常应该回滚成功

Ⅳ. How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)

  1. Seata 驱动：mysql-connector-java-8.0.19.jar
  2. 微服务数据库驱动：com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver
  3. 多MySQL节点，数据库连接使用 loadbalance 负载均衡

Ⅴ. Anything else we need to know?

如果换成单mysql 连接就可以
例如：jdbc:mysql://192.168.100.50:3306/pinecone-cloud?rewriteBatchedStatements=true&allowMultiQueries=true&useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=UTF-8&useSSL=false （已测试，执行正常）
数据库表引擎为 ndb：

Ⅵ. Environment:

  • JDK version : Jdk8 1.8.0_202
  • Seata version: Seata 1.4.2
  • OS : Windows 10
  • DataBase: mysql-cluster 8.0 ( Linux CentOS 7.6、Docker 部署)
  • Others: Nacos 2.0.3 作为注册、配置中心

pullRequest.title: [WIP]optimize : change transaction state thread-safe in db mode

node.title: db/redis mode must be thread-safe when changing the transaction state
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe in details
db/redis模式需串行更改事务状态,假设事务A在tm端进行决议提交，此时到达了tc端，而tc端刚好发现这个事务达到了超时，就会更改状态为超时回滚，而这两个动作是并行的，导致决议提交时删除了全局锁，又恰好被改为超时回滚，导致分支事务被回滚，回滚时可能会发现数据已经无法对上了（全局锁被删了）

How it could be?

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. You can explain more about input of the feature, and output of it.
1.redis可使用锁+读+改的方式或lua脚本来保证原子性修改
2.db模式可以使用乐观锁形式，updatestatus时，必须现在的status是当前globalsession的status否则要失败
有其他更好的方案欢迎讨论

Other related information

Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

当Store为redis时，由于事务提交速度过快，导致redis中遗留大量的事务session未来的及清除，当TC重启时SessionHolder.init()会同步加载所有session，循环检查，此时会阻塞TC启动进程，目前遇到过的最长阻塞超过10分钟。

node.title: seata AT模式 file存储数据 持续高并发压力下导致频繁full gc
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

压测数据

AT模式使用异步提交，
file使用内存模式存储事务记录和全局锁记录
全局事务提交的时候，使用异步提交
异步提交定时任务，只有一个线程
持续高并发压力下，导致内存中的事务记录堆积的越来越多
直到最后频繁full gc，cpu被gc线程占满

pullRequest.title: Add AT transaction mode tests to support database data types (MySQL n…

node.title: [task]  Add AT transaction mode tests to support database data types (MySQL)
node.bodyHTML:
Why you need it?

Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe in details

Add AT transaction mode tests to support database data types (MySQL)
增加 AT事务模式中对数据库数据类型的测试，当前任务针对MySQL

The purpose of the test case is to verify that the COMMIT and ROLLBACK are correct
测试case目的是验证commit和rollback的正确性

Code can be submitted on the https://github.com/seata/seata-test or https://github.com/seata/seata/tree/develop/test
提交的代码可以放到 https://github.com/seata/seata-test 或 https://github.com/seata/seata/tree/develop/test

In this issue, tasks will be disassembled according to the classification of data types.
这个issue中会按照数据类型做分类拆解，按找数据类型的分类进行任务的拆解。

How it could be?

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. You can explain more about input of the feature, and output of it.

Other related information

Add any other context or screenshots about the feature request here.

node.title: seata AT模式 file存储数据 持续高并发压力下导致频繁full gc
node.bodyHTML:
• I have searched the issues of this repository and believe that this is not a duplicate.

Ⅰ. Issue Description

压测数据

AT模式使用异步提交，
file使用内存模式存储事务记录和全局锁记录
全局事务提交的时候，使用异步提交
异步提交定时任务，只有一个线程
持续高并发压力下，导致内存中的事务记录堆积的越来越多
直到最后频繁full gc，cpu被gc线程占满
